mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(A.ID,'') ID,A.TITLE,A.AUTHOR,A.CREATEDATE,A.CATEGORY,A.INTRODUCTION,A.ADDRESS, if(A.private=0,'否','是') PRIVATE FROM ARTICLES A
mapper.update: UPDATE articles A SET A.category=#{category},A.introduction=#{introduction},A.private=#{serret} WHERE A.id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from articles where category=#{category};
